channel.title: Server Restarter Help
channel.description: [size=10pt]Im currently using the server restarter from TokkulScape, and whenever i try to use the server restarter i get an error. I cannot show you the error because for some reason the terminal screen just shuts off automatically. If there's a way for me to stop it from doing that, that would be nice. Or help me create a new server restarter.[/size]
